trans-unit.source: Specifies the culture-specific display of digits.
trans-unit.target: 指定的区域性特定显示的位数。

trans-unit.source: A DigitShapes value specifies that no digit shape is substituted for the Unicode input, a digit shape is substituted based on context, or a native national digit shape is substituted for the input.
trans-unit.target: DigitShapes 值指定任何数字形状替换为 Unicode 输入、 数字形状是被替换的基于的上下文，或输入替换本机国家/地区的数字形状。

trans-unit.source: The Arabic, Indic, and Thai languages have classical shapes for numbers that are different from the digits 0 through 9 (Unicode U+0030 through U+0039), which are most often used on computers.
trans-unit.target: 阿拉伯语、 印度语和泰语语言具有不同于数字 0 到 9 (Unicode U + 0030 到 U + 0039)，在计算机最常使用的数字的古典形状。

trans-unit.source: The application uses the DigitShapes enumeration with the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.DigitSubstitution%2A> property to specify how to display digits U+0030 through U+0039 in the absence of other formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序使用的 DigitShapes 枚举<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.DigitSubstitution%2A>属性来指定如何在没有其他格式设置信息中显示数字 U +&0030; 到 U +&0039;。</xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.DigitSubstitution%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DigitShapes enumeration is primarily used by applications intended for cultures that use bidirectional scripts.
trans-unit.target: 适用于使用双向脚本的区域性的应用程序主要使用 DigitShapes 枚举。

trans-unit.source: For example, the reading order of Arabic and Indic scripts is bidirectional.
trans-unit.target: 例如，阿拉伯语和印度语的阅读顺序是双向的。

trans-unit.source: The digit shape depends on the previous text in the same output.
trans-unit.target: 数字形状取决于相同的输出中前面的文本。

trans-unit.source: European digits follow Latin scripts; Arabic-Indic digits follow Arabic text; and Thai digits follow Thai text.
trans-unit.target: 欧洲数字拉丁文; 泰语阿拉伯-印度文数字按照 Arabic 文本;然后泰语数字按照泰语文本。

trans-unit.source: The digit shape is the native equivalent of the digits from 0 through 9.
trans-unit.target: 数字形状是从 0 到 9 的数字的本机等效项。

trans-unit.source: ASCII digits from 0 through 9 are replaced by equivalent native national digits.
trans-unit.target: 从 0 到 9 的 ASCII 数字将由等效国家/地区的本机数字替换。

trans-unit.source: The digit shape is not changed.

trans-unit.target: 将保留完整的 Unicode 兼容性。
